Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
-- Program is finished if all lines are read from inputfile or if
10 errors are detected
12.11.2013 SH SCR18504 Extended validation of D.InvoiceDate if GNRL_CODE = NL
17.09.2013 JH SCR18381 Added new column D.NettPaymentsDays (N)
26.08.2013 SH SCR18372 Added new column markcode
25.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
05.05.2011 SH SCR16446 Replaced table CURR by CURA
19.01.2011 SH SCR16159 Added NFIA_DUEDATE
03.01.2011 SH SCR16113 Removed test that all rows type 50 must have the same
value in field D.Currency_ISO and D.DueDate where D.AwizoNo is the same
07.12.2010 SH SCR16050 Fixed problem with 'blank' lines in files (also Hex 00)
22.02.2008 SH SCR13420 Moved BSP202-10 from part "stored after first NFIN"
to the end of program after calilng BSP202-20
08.01.2007 SH SCR13260 Store one extra NFER row in case of >= 10 errors
21.12.2007 SH SCR13235 Extended test on debtor number ('0000000000')
-- Input variables with proper FL pictures
-- Previous values of input variables, have to be tested only in case of changes
-- Debtor values
-- Validation and error handling
... uses to check if the 3 following variables are all the same, if not error
... uses to check if Awizo number is the same for all flag 50 rows and the
subtotal row flag (55)
.. all 50, 55 rows and the total fag 60 rows must have the same client
... sum of invoice amount of all flag 50 rows must be the same as the invoice
amount of the flag 55 row
... sum of compensations amount of all flag 50 rows inside a 55
block must be 0
-- Storing to new invoice aviso (NFIA = falg 50 / 55) and
invoice file (NFIN = flag 55)
-- Set variables
... unique for 50, 50, 50, ...until 55 rows, will be increased with +1
for the next 50, 50, 50, ...until 55 rows if the NFIN row is stored
-- Init following check variables to test if there is a change with values which
never exists
(if using default values then the program never detects empty / 0 fields)
-- Perform the following steps only if there's no reason to reject the file, see
call of BSP202_10 in R.S.
-- Error --> No total row exists (flag 60)
-- If at least one NFER (error) row is stored set PO.ERROR = TRUE
-- Define the handling type if at least one NFIN row is stored and no errors
are detected (not if uploaded via website --> PI.NFIR_IFIL_ID = 0)
-- Check if file has to be rejected after the last NFIN row is stored and no
errors are detected (not if uploaded via website --> PI.NFIR_IFIL_ID = 0)
-- Reset variables
-- Last line could be contain "END OF FILE' the handling of this row will be
skipped (test on 'EN' because first field is alpha 2)
-- First line should contain a header row, in this case ignore this line and
also the last line (included only "END OF FILE")
.. also blank lines have to be ignored (also lines with Hex 00)
-- Error --> Recordflag not 50, 55, 60
-- Handle detail records (50,55)
... always update NFIR_ADMNO / NFIR_CLNTNO for first row where admnistration and
client number are exist
... in case of no errors are detected store row in NFIA / NFIN
-- Handle total record (60), in case of no erros are detected in detail rows
-- Program is finished if all lines are read from inputfile or if
10 errors are detected
-- Inform users that testing is stopped because of >= 10 errors
... fetch error text
-- Format input fields to their proper FL pictures
-- Check for existing client (only once or in case of changes)
-- Error --> Client does not exisrts
-- Check debtor number (only once or in case of changes)
... error --> debtor number = blank or contains only '0' characters
... check if debtor is allowed for reverse factoring
-- Check invoice number
... error --> invoice number = blank or 0
-- Check invoice date
... must have value and must be a valid date
... must be between date from and date until
... invoice date > day programs date
-- Check value date
... optional but must be a valid date if <> blank
... must be between date from and date until
-- Check Debit/Credit flag
... error --> not (-, +, space)
-- Check currency code (only in case of changes)
-- Error --> Currency code = blank or does not exisrts
-- Check due date
... must have value and must be a valid date
... must be between date from and date until
-- Check debtor name (must be <> blank if flag = 55)
... error --> debtor name = blank
-- Check debtor country code (only in case of changes)
(debtor country is optional)
-- Error --> Country does not exisrts
-- Check markcode (only in case of changes)
-- Error --> Markcode does not exisrts
-- Check invoice amount against compensation amount (if falg = 50)
-- Check invoice / aviso number (if flag = 55)
-- in case of non existing debtor reverese factoring is not allowed
... and also if DEBH_REVERSEFACTORING <> 'Y'
... fetch error text
-- Reset total variables
-- Format input fields to their proper FL pictures
-- Total number of rows (flag 50) <> Total number (flag 60)
-- Total NFIN amounts (flag 55) <> Total amount (flag(60)
-- Uses in parent task to write error to NFER if no total row exists
-- Additional validations
.. All 50, 55 rows and the total fag 60 rows must have the same client
... fetch error text
-- variables uses to check of totals are OK
-- Additional validations
... Awizo number has to be same for all flag 50 rows inside a flag 55 block
.. All 50, 55 rows and the total fag 60 rows must have the same client
-- uses to check if equal to NFIA_AMOUNT (flag 55 row)
... Sum of compensations amount of all flag 50 rows inside a 55
block must be 0
... fetch error text
-- Increase v.NFIN_LINENO with +1 for the next 50 / 55 rows
-- Reset NFIA_LINENO, starts with 1 for the new 50, 50, 50, ...until 55 block
-- Update some NFIR fields for first stored NFIN row
-- variables uses to check of totals are OK
-- Additional validations
... check if the 3 following variables have the same value for all stored NFIN
rows
... Awizo number has to be same for all flag 50 rows and the flag 55 row
.. All 50, 55 rows and the total fag 60 rows must have the same client
... Sm of invoice amount of all flag 50 rows must be the same as the invoice
amount of the flag 55 row
... Sum of compensations amount of all flag 50 rows inside a 55
block must be 0
... fetch error text
